title: Metalmeccanici, al via manifestazioni in tutta Italia
text:
Roma, 28 mar. (askanews) – Al via in tutta Italia le manifestazioni dei metalmeccanici che protestano per il rinnovo del contratto. La trattativa per il rinnovo del contratto è bloccata dal 12 novembre scorso e, con una nota congiunta, Fim, Fiom e Uilm ricordano di aver avanzato proposte per rilanciare l’industria e il lavoro nel settore. “Vogliamo confermare le norme del precedente contratto e stabilire gli aumenti in particolare riguardo al salario – dicono i sindacati di categoria – loro (Federmeccanica) non vogliono dare certezza e garantire sugli aumenti”.
“Tutti parlano dei bassi salari, tutti raccontano dei bassi salari ma quando gli diciamo che vogliamo contrattare Federmeccanica non si siede al tavolo: è un atto antidemocratico, noi non ci fermeremo fino a quando non riprenderemo la trattativa e porteremo a casa il rinnovo del contratto nazionale”, ha affermato Michele De Palma, segretario generale Fiom Cgil alla manifestazione di Reggio Emilia.
Secondo la leader Cisl, Daniela Fumarola “è inaccettabile che, dopo mesi di trattative interrotte, Federmeccanica e Assistal continuino a ignorare legittime richieste sindacali. Il contratto collettivo è fondamentale per adeguare i salari al costo della vita, migliorare le condizioni di lavoro, generare e redistribuire crescita garantendo maggiore sicurezza, soprattutto negli appalti. Rifiutarsi di rinnovare significa mortificare la dignità, il valore e il ruolo di chi, ogni giorno, contribuisce alla crescita del Paese in settori strategici”, scrive sui social.
“In una situazione come questa, dove ci sono i dazi, la prima cosa importante sono le fabbriche e i lavoratori. I lavoratori difendono l’Italia, difendono la manifattura e con la loro azione hanno sempre debellato questioni negative”, ha rivendicato il segretario generale Uilm, Rocco Palombella alla manifestazione a Napoli.

author: straitstimes.com
title: Ukraine military says Russian troops pushed out of part of key eastern town | The Straits Times
text:
KYIV - Ukraine's military said on June 27 its forces had forced Russian troops out of a district in the town of Chasiv Yar on the war's eastern front seen as Moscow's next target in its slow advance through the area.
But a Russian report said Moscow's forces had destroyed a communications tower near the town and made further headway.
Russian forces are slowly pushing their way across parts of eastern Ukraine, capturing several villages since seizing the key city of Avdiivka in February.
Chasiv Yar stands on high ground 20km to the west of Bakhmut, a town Russian forces captured a year ago after months of battles. Both sides see Chasiv Yar as a potential staging point for Russia to advance on the key cities of the eastern Donetsk region, including Kramatorsk and Slovyansk.
Mr Nazar Voloshyn, a spokesman for Ukraine's southern group of forces, told the Ukrinform news agency that Russian forces had moved out of Chasiv Yar's "Kanal" district along the Siverskyi Donets-Donbas canal that runs along the town's eastern edge.
"Ukrainian defenders have indeed squeezed Russian forces out of the Kanal district in Chasiv Yar in Donetsk region," Ukrinform quoted Mr Voloshyn as saying. "The enemy army is no longer there."
Mr Voloshyn told other Ukrainian media outlets that Russian troops were shelling Kyiv's forces in more than 200 incidents over 24 hours, mostly on the town's southern approaches.
The Ukrainian military's General Staff, in a late evening report on June 27, said Russian troops had tried to push back Ukrainian forces six times near Chasiv Yar. Three attacks were repelled and fighting still gripped the area.
Ukraine's embassy in Washington posted a plea on social media platform X to stop Russia's advance on Chasiv Yar, saying Russia was "desperately trying to wipe out the town targeting even damaged churches and civilian residential blocks of flats.
Embed Twitter Tweet URL A Ukrainian serviceman playing piano in a damaged building in Chasiv Yar, in Ukraine’s Donetsk region, on June 25. PHOTO: EPA-EFE "We must prevent Russia from turning it into a ghost city before it's too late."
A dispatch by Russia's Tass news agency quoted the commander of a Russian brigade, Stanislav Orlov, as saying his forces had destroyed a communications tower on the town's highest point.
Embed Twitter Tweet URL "This allowed for a breakthrough to be made without losses," the dispatch quoted him as saying.
Ukraine has long anticipated a Russian advance on the town.
Its top commander, Colonel-General Oleksandr Syrskyi, said in May that Moscow's forces had hoped to capture Chasiv Yar in time for May 9 ceremonies marking the anniversary of the Soviet victory in World War II. REUTERS

author: Мария Мельникова
title: Мужчина с ножом напал на медперсонал в больнице Иркутска
text:
Утром 3 июля в городской клинической больнице № 8 в Иркутске пациент с ножом и газовым баллончиком напал на медработников, его задержали. Об этом говорится в телеграм-канале регионального Следственного комитета.
В СК уточнили, что в результате нападения были ранены две женщины.
«Пострадавшие госпитализированы. Подозреваемый задержан сотрудниками полиции. На месте происшествия работают следователи-криминалисты СК», — сказано в пресс-релизе.
Возбуждено уголовное дело по ч. 3 ст. 30, ч. 2 ст. 105 УК РФ (покушение на убийство двух и более лиц).
Следователи сейчас устанавливают обстоятельства ЧП. Задержанный в ближайшее время будет доставлен в следственный отдел для допроса.
Позже РИА Новости опубликовало видеозапись с задержанием напавшего. Мужчина объяснил свой поступок тем, что «его лишили права на жизнь по Конституции и по конвенции ООН о правах инвалидов».
Когда ему в ответ сказали, что это не повод нападать на людей, задержанный ответил, что «ему, наверное, виднее».
Глава Иркутской области Игорь Кобзев уточнил, что в результате нападения заместитель главного врача и секретарь учреждения госпитализированы в тяжелом состоянии. В настоящее время медики борются за их жизни.
«Со своей стороны отмечу, что мы окажем всю необходимую помощь пострадавшим и их семьям. На месте находится министр здравоохранения Андрей Арсеньевич Модестов, правоохранительные и следственные органы», — отметил губернатор.
По его словам, медицинские работники всегда стоят на защите человеческих жизней и страшно, когда они сами подвергаются опасности.
Он напомнил, что это не первый случай нападения на медиков. В ноябре 2024 года при исполнении служебных обязанностей погиб фельдшер скорой помощи Александр Печелатов.
«Уверен, что виновник будет наказан по всей строгости закона. Желаю скорейшего выздоровления пострадавшим и сил родственникам. Спасибо врачам за их опасную и сложную работу», — добавил Кобзев.
В Иркутской области в ноябре прошлого года во время транспортировки пациент напал на фельдшера из Казачинско-Ленской районной больницы. Медик скончался от полученных ран, у него остались двое детей. Позже президент России Владимир Путин наградил его посмертно медалью Луки Крымского.

author: Waqas Arain
title: FSB Neutralizes ISIS Cell Plotting Attack on Moscow Synagogue, Seizes Weapons Cache
text:
Russia's Federal Security Service (FSB) successfully dismantled an Islamic State (IS)
cell in Kaluga, accused of plotting a violent attack on a Moscow synagogue, showcasing the ongoing threat of terrorism within the country's borders. Firearms, ammunition, and explosive device components were discovered during the raid, confirming the lethal intentions of the cell members, who were killed after resisting arrest.
Swift Action Averts Tragedy
In a clandestine operation southwest of Moscow, FSB operatives targeted an IS cell with direct links to the Afghan branch of Islamic State. Intelligence gathered pinpointed the group's plan to attack Jewish worshippers at a synagogue in Moscow, aiming to cause mass casualties. The raid not only prevented a potential tragedy but also highlighted the intricate network of terrorism that transcends national boundaries. The operation's success was underscored by the seizure of a significant cache of weapons, which included firearms, ammunition, and materials for making improvised explosive devices (IEDs).
International Implications
The neutralized cell's affiliation with the Afghan branch of Islamic State sheds light on the global connections and the relentless spread of extremist ideology. The FSB's announcement did not specify the citizenship of the cell members, adding a layer of complexity to the incident. This operation is a stark reminder of the persistent danger posed by international terrorism, prompting questions about the effectiveness of global counter-terrorism strategies and the necessity of international cooperation in combatting these threats.
Reactions and Responses
The news of the foiled plot and the consequent raid was met with relief and concern. The Zvezda news outlet, closely associated with Russia's military and security apparatus, published an FSB video that graphically depicted the aftermath of the operation, including the weaponry seized and the bodies of the militants. This explicit portrayal serves not only as evidence of the cell's lethal intentions but also as a grim reminder of the deadly consequences of radicalization. The incident has sparked a broader dialogue about security measures in places of worship and the need for vigilance in the face of terrorism's evolving threat.
As the dust settles on this thwarted attack, the implications for Russia's internal security and the broader international community remain significant. The operation underscores the relentless vigilance required to counter the scourge of terrorism and the importance of preemptive action in safeguarding innocent lives. While the immediate threat was neutralized, the incident serves as a sobering reminder of the continuous need for comprehensive strategies to combat the global spread of extremist ideologies. As we move forward, the focus must remain on strengthening both national and international frameworks to address and mitigate these pervasive threats.

author: Zaina Jnina
title: Le Maroc s'apprête à établir un nouveau record d'exportation d'avocats
text:
Le Maroc continue de briller dans le secteur de la production et de l’exportation d’avocats, avec des résultats impressionnants qui devraient culminer dans un record d’exportation pour la saison 2023/2024, selon les estimations du portail spécialisé EastFruit.
Le dynamisme du secteur de la production et de l’exportation d’avocats s’affirme comme un pilier essentiel de l’économie marocaine, inscrivant une trajectoire de croissance soutenue. Entre juillet 2023 et janvier 2024, le Maroc a réalisé un performance remarquable en exportant près de 40.000 tonnes d’avocats, d’une valeur estimée à 120 millions de dollars, établissant ainsi un nouveau record pour cette période.
De plus, malgré les habitudes de ralentissement observées traditionnellement en juin, les perspectives pour la saison 2023/2024 promettent des sommets sans précédent, avec des estimations préliminaires suggérant que les exportations pourraient franchir la barre des 60.000 tonnes.
Selon EastFruit, cette performance exceptionnelle est largement attribuable à une augmentation de 20% de la récolte d’avocats du Maroc en 2023 par rapport à l’année précédente. Cette croissance a été stimulée par des conditions météorologiques favorables et l’expansion des zones de culture. Toutefois, des défis persistent, notamment les vagues de sécheresse persistantes, la rareté de l’eau et la crise hydrique, ainsi que la fin des subventions gouvernementales à l’irrigation pour les nouvelles plantations, qui pourraient potentiellement avoir un impact sur les exportations futures, explique le portail spécialisé.
En outre, il révèle que bien que les exportations d’avocats en provenance du Maroc montrent une croissance soutenue, le marché reste en grande partie dépendant de quelques destinations clés, principalement en Europe. En effet, les exportateurs marocains ciblent en particulier des pays de l’Union européenne tels que l’Espagne, la France, les Pays-Bas et l’Allemagne, tandis que les volumes d’exportation d’avocats vers des pays en dehors des cinq principaux importateurs varient de 700 à 1.900 tonnes en fonction des fluctuations saisonnières.
Toutefois, le Maroc s’est engagé dans une démarche de diversification de ses débouchés à l’exportation, bien que cette entreprise avance avec prudence. Une avancée significative récente, relayée par EastFruit, réside dans l’introduction réussie des avocats Hass marocains sur le marché géorgien.
